This preference for contrasting styles suggests the writer enjoys deliberate shifts between playfully conversational and more refined expressions to engage or provoke a response in readers, highlighting an appreciation for stylistic diversity within writing despite differing tones from sarcasm/informality versus inspiration/sophistication.
